general.gigTitle: design, develop, customize or migrate wordpress website

sellerCard.description:
BFT Consulting is a leading SEO, digital internet marketing, and web design company dedicated to helping businesses thrive online. With a focus on delivering measurable results, we offer a comprehensive suite of services tailored to meet the unique needs of each client.

Our team of experienced professionals combines cutting-edge strategies with proven techniques to boost your online presence, drive traffic to your website, and increase conversions. 

Let BFT Consultants be your partner in success. Contact us today to learn more about how we can help your business thrive online.

description.content:
Expert WordPress Website Design & Development Services


I'm Vinod Bansal, a seasoned Software Engineer with 12 years of rich experience in crafting responsive, professional, and impactful WordPress websites.


What services will you Get:


Custom WordPress Design: A unique and eye-catching WordPress web tailored to your brand identity and audience.


Responsive Development: Your website will be fully responsive across all devices.


User-Friendly Interface: I prioritize usability and navigation, creating an intuitive interface that makes it easy for visitors to find what they want.


SEO Optimization: Optimize your web for search engines.


Integration of Essential Plugins: From contact forms to social media integration, I'll install and configure essential plugins to enhance functionality and user engagement.


E-commerce Solutions (if needed): If you're looking to sell products or services online, I can integrate an e-commerce solution such as WooCommerce, ensuring a smooth customer shopping experience.


Ongoing Support: Provide you with ongoing support.



Contact me today to discuss your project requirements and get started on creating your dream website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I see more samples of your work?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely, just send me a message! :)

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: First and most important, I will need to know as much as possible about you and your business, that way I'll be able to make you a site that truly represents you. Other than that, I will need access to your hosting account or existing wordpress website

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I be able to easily modify the contents of the site?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! Once the website is done, you will be able to not only change the texts and images with a few clicks, but also to change the whole layout or add new pages. If you can change your facebook image you will be able to change an image on the site as well, that is how easy it is.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is my satisfaction guaranteed?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely, that's why I'm here. I offer unlimited revisions to all packages, so I'm ready to work untill you are fully satisfied.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do I have to provide you the text for the site?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, but its alright if you don't have it at the moment. I can use dummy content that you can change easily later.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I have your email or skype?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, this is against the Terms of Service of Fiverr. I will only respond to messages send here on Fiverr.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is a unique page"?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: A unique page is a page in your website that has a unique(manually made) design. Unique pages are: Homepage, About, Contact, Services etc. a Non-unique page is a page that is generated automatically from the site, for example, the product pages in an online store, or the article pages in a blog.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Why should I message you before placing an order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: By doing so I will be able to show you more examples of my work and more importantly, I will be able to tell you if the above packages will cover your site or a custom quote will be needed

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you provide a custom quote for my project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! Just send me a message and lets discuss it.

reviews.comment:
very good experience with this seller .  my website was completed in time and this seller did everything perfectly  and gave me very useful advice as well. it was overall very smooth experience . since communication is  fast with him any changes that i ask were made quickly and without any flaw . i will use him again for my future  work. 10/10 ! i already gave him second order ! its such a relife to have a good website developer on your side . 

i highly recommend him .

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for the feedback and appreciating my efforts. Feel free to reach for any future development or SEO services for your business.

reviews.comment: Vinod was great to work with, easy to get along with, understood my requirements, very good technically. I will be using Vinod & BFT Consulting again. Thank you.

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your kind feedback! We look forward to the opportunity of working with you again in the future.

reviews.comment: This is the second time working with Vinod and his team, excellent work and very professional. the work is always delivered in good time and to my specifications, the team are always willing to help even out side of the contracted period with any issues i may have.
The best service we get!! He know exactly what we want for webdesign. Good communication. He can do everything with a website!!

reviews_snippet.comment: This is the second time working with Vinod and his team, excellent work and very professional. the work is always delivered in good time and to my specifications, the team are always willing to help even out side of the contracted period with any issues i may have.
The best service we get!! He know exactly what we want for webdesign. Good communication. He can do everything with a website!!
i would definitely recommend these guys, they did exactly what i wanted and made all the minor changes i wanted quickly.

---

Vinod's web development services were outstanding. His expertise was evident throughout the project as he delivered a website that was not only aesthetically pleasing but also highly functional and user-friendly. He communicated effectively, met all deadlines, and his attention to detail was impressive. The end product exceeded expectations.
Great work! Have worked with you in the past besides now and will continue to work with you moving forward. Thanks!
